translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

On this date, an order is issued to the Chief of Police of Alegrete to disarm the emigrants of the United Army, with the exception of the officers, and to march them all to São Gabriel, to which point the Excellent Bento Manuel has sent Your Lordship, in order to place yourself at the head of these emigrants; consequently, the government orders Your Lordship to keep them there under your watch, supplying them only with meat rations.

If, in order to carry out the disarmament of the said emigrants, it is necessary for that chief of police to have the support of armed forces, Your Lordship

God preserve Your Lordship  
Secretary of the War Affairs  
Caçapava, January 19, 1840  
Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira  
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre
